name: Ruqqus
description: Ruqqus is an open-source aggregation platform for online communities.

notes: The platform does not currently display advertisements. It relies on user donations.
This policy does not say what will happen in the event of a data breach.
The personal data collected is not specified in this policy.
Ruqqus allows a user to permanently 'deactivate' their account.
There is no privacy policy history, changelog or last modified date.

citations: At our discretion, Ruqqus may share your information with United States law enforcement in the event of an emergency, if we have good cause to believe that doing so would avert or mitigate the emergency.

notes: There is no list of personal information collected.
It seems any data currently collected is used to maintain the platform.
There is nothing in the privacy policy stating what will happen if the policy changes.
